entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets in the morning. Light snow beginning near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
